display_long_description:
Reducept is an application that helps you reduce chronic pain by training your brain. Through the medium Virtual Reality, you will be guided through the nervous system of your body. During this journey, you learn how pain works and where it comes from. Along the path, you will complete exercises that train your brain to gain control over your pain. Get ready for the journey and take control of your pain yourself. How to create an account? Firstly visit https://reducept.com/order-1 and select your preferred package method. Secondly, complete the registration and wait for an email from us. Finally, enter your email details in the pop-up paywall to unlock the rest of the game.
NOTE: Reducept is suitable for everyone with chronic pain. To get a Reducept license, users are prompted to sign up on our website with one of two following payment methods: € 149/year or € 14,95/month.
